name: Agents of the Authority Quiz | Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: What does Apollo derive his powers from?
questions.explanation:
The sun.

	Apollo's many powers are solar-powered. He can fly, has super-strength and speed, can fire beams from his eyes, and fire solar blasts. When this energy is depleted, he is weak and vulnerable.

questions.text: How did Midnighter kill Henry Bendix?
options: He punched a hole through Bendix
He kicked his neck until it broke
questions.explanation:
He ripped out his spine.

	The Midnighter is Apollo's husband and is known for his violent tendencies. The two were married in the 8th issue of "The Authority" and adopted a girl named Jenny Quantum.

questions.text: When Moscow was attacked, what ailed Jack Hawksmoor?
questions.explanation:
A nosebleed.

	Jack Hawksmoor has a symbiotic relationship with cities and cannot survive for long outside of a city. When a city is damaged, Hawksmoor is also hurt, thus the nosebleed.

questions.text: Jenny Quantum is the reincarnation of which other heroine?
questions.explanation:
Jenny Sparks.

	Jenny Quantum is the living embodiment of the 21st century, just like Jenny Sparks was the embodiment of the 20th century.

questions.text: The Authority's base of operations is sentient.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The Carrier is a large fortress, being everywhere at once. It is sentient and thus, might be considered another member of the team. Following the tradition, the Carrier is considered a female.

questions.text: When the Authority were trapped on our Earth, where did Apollo crash?
questions.explanation:
Afghanistan.

	Flying in order to recharge his solar battery, Apollo was shot down by U.S. forces over Afghanistan. Injured, he is knocked senseless and the Midnighter arrives to do battle with approaching military forces.

questions.text: During the "Transfer of Power" storyline, who was the member who could generate electiricity?
questions.explanation:
The Colonel.

	The Colonel was British by nationality, and constantly insulted other team members. This was especially demoralizing because he was the team leader!

	Rush was a singer with wings, as a result of surgery. She was a singer and proclaimed herself a lesbian.

questions.text: For how long did Midnighter and Apollo go underground?
questions.explanation:
Five years.

	Midnighter and Apollo were part of a superheroic team whose existence was only known to the members and the creator of the team, Henry Bendix. Apollo and Midnighter are the only survivors of this team, and went underground for five years together.

questions.text: For how long did Midnighter have AIDS?
questions.explanation:
6 weeks.

	The Midnighter has an enhanced immune system. Colds are cured in a couple of minutes, and when he was infected with AIDS, his immune system overcame the disease in six weeks.
